name: Cursed Soul
description:
Prototype phase: Pre-Alpha

Beta available: 12 April

Cursed Soul is an puzzle, adventure and horror game in First-Person camera. Your soul is enclosed in a house due a curse of the former owners who performed rituals. And your objective is to get the prismas to break free your soul, and scape.

Follow us on Twitter to know the evolution of the project

Twitter: @CursedSoulTeam

Mail: wunjo.tyr@gmail.com
